snippet: Over the next week, 22 teams playing 17 matches will compete for the final 11 spots in the 2014 World Cup in Brazil.
abstract: World Cup qualifying process will conclude with 22 teams playing 17 matches for the final 11 spots; overview of regional playoffs.
lead_paragraph: Over the next week, 22 teams playing 17 matches will compete for the final 11 spots in the 2014 World Cup in Brazil.

headline.main: Around the World for a Ticket to the World Cup
headline.print_headline:
Around the World in 17 Playoff Games
For a Ticket to the World Cup in Brazil
